steps.gmResponse:
Dungeon Entrance
crumbling stone archway. moss-covered walls. flickering torchlight. musty air. ancient runes carved into doorframe.
Exits: north
You see: Old Guard

validationResult.reason: The response provides a coherent description of the Dungeon Entrance, including notable features and available exits, which aligns with MUD conventions.

steps.gmResponse:
Dark Corridor
narrow stone passage. echoing footsteps. dripping water sounds. spider webs in corners. worn flagstone floor.
Exits: south, east, west, north
You see: Suspicious Loose Stone

Forgotten Armory
rusty weapon racks. tarnished armor stands. smell of old leather and metal. cobwebs covering shields. ancient battle standards hanging.
Exits: east
You see: Rusty Iron Sword, Sharp Steel Dagger, Worn Leather Armor, Heavy Chainmail
You take the Rusty Iron Sword.
You equip the Rusty Iron Sword (+5 damage).

Dark Corridor
narrow stone passage. echoing footsteps. dripping water sounds. spider webs in corners. worn flagstone floor.
Exits: south, east, west, north
You see: Suspicious Loose Stone

Ancient Treasury
gleaming gold coins scattered. ornate treasure chests. jeweled artifacts on pedestals. magical aura in the air. dust motes dancing in shaft of light.
Exits: west
You see: Heavy Gold Pouch, Red Health Potion, Locked Ornate Chest
You take the Red Health Potion.
You take the Heavy Gold Pouch.

steps.gmResponse:
Abandoned Throne Room
massive stone throne. faded royal tapestries. cracked marble floor. ominous shadows. cold draft from unseen passages. skeleton slumped on throne.
Exits: south, north
You see: Skeleton King

validationResult.reason: [CODE] Movement succeeded: entered room 'Abandoned Throne Room'

steps.gmResponse:
Hidden Chamber
mysteriously lit crystal formations. ancient magical circles etched in floor. floating arcane symbols. humming with magical energy. portal-like shimmer in far wall.
